      • getDatabaseRecord

        @RequestMapping(value="/record",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseStatus(value=OK)
public GenBankRecord getDatabaseRecord(@RequestParam(value="accession")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String accession,
                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="isfull",required=false,defaultValue="true")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.Boolean isFull)
                                                                                                                        throws GenBankRecordNotFoundException,
                                                                                                                               DaoException,
                                                                                                                               ParameterException
        Retrieves the specified record from the database.
        Parameters:
        accession - - Accession of GenBankRecord to be retrieved
        isFull - - does the record need its associated Publication and Genes
        Returns:
        specified record from the database.
        Throws:
        GenBankRecordNotFoundException
        DaoException
        ParameterException

      • queryAccessions

        @RequestMapping(value="/search/accessions",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseStatus(value=OK)
public java.util.List<GenBankRecord> queryAccessions(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> accessions)
                                                                                                                                                  throws ParameterException,
                                                                                                                                                         LuceneSearcherException,
                                                                                                                                                         InvalidLuceneQueryException
        As a results of HTTP Header size conflicts, this service is meant to query a long specific list of Accession.
        Parameters:
        accessions - - Accessions to query
        Returns:
        list of index GenBankRecords for the given accessions
        Throws:
        ParameterException
        LuceneSearcherException
        InvalidLuceneQueryException

      • retrieveTemplate

        @RequestMapping(value="/template",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseStatus(value=OK)
public java.lang.String retrieveTemplate(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> accessions)
                                                                                                                             throws ParameterException,
                                                                                                                                    GLMException
        Generates a GLM Predictors template for users to fill in. Template already includes lat, long, and SampleSize.
        Parameters:
        accessions - - Accessions to base template on
        Returns:
        GLM Predictors template
        Throws:
        ParameterException
        GLMException
